All Implemented Interfaces:
Resource
public class HttpResource
extends Object
implements Resource

Accesses resources via the HTTP(S) protocol.

create

Creates the resource with the specified representation. If the resource already exists, this method will indicate failure by throwing a ResourceException.

            throws ResourceException
